description: This file defines a React component for handling the OAuth callback flow for Jira integration. It displays authorization status messages, manages redirect logic, and provides user interface elements for retry or continuation.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component wrapping the callback logic in a Suspense boundary to satisfy Next.js requirements.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component that processes OAuth callback parameters, updates UI based on success or error, and handles navigation.
